00037 #include <stdlib.h>
00038 #include <stdio.h>
00039 #include <avr/io.h>
00040 #include "uart.h"
00041 #include "adc.h"

00043 
00044 /* Initialize ADC, but not yet start a conversion
00045  */
00046 void init_adc()
00047 {
00048                 /* set ADC Multiplexer register 
00049                  * REFS1 = 0, REFS0 = 1 -> Avcc is Vref
00050                  * ADLAR = 0 -> right-adjust conversion result
00051                  * MUX4-0 = 00100 -> ADC4 (Header Steering 1)
00052                  */
00053                  ADMUX = (1<<REFS0) | (1<<MUX2);
00054                  
00055                  /* set ADC Control Register A
00056                   * ADEN = 1 -> switch on ADC
00057                   * ADSC = 0 -> not yet start conversion
00058                   * ADFR = 0 -> dont operate in free-running mode
00059                   * ADIF = -> .. interrupt flag
00060                   * ADIE = 0 -> deactive interrupts by ADC
00061                   * ADPS2-0 = 111 -> prescaler of 128 -> ADC-Clock is 125kHz, 
00062                   *                             slowest possible for maximum resolution
00063                   * */
00064                  ADCSRA = (1<<ADEN) | (1<<ADPS2) | (1<<ADPS1) | (1<<ADPS0);
00065 }
00066 
00067 
00068 /** select the active ADC-Channel from input multiplexer
00069  * @param channel ADC-Channel to read, 0-7
00070  */
00071 void adc_sel_channel(char channel)
00072 {
00073                 ADMUX = ADMUX & 0xE0; /* clear lower 5 bits */
00074                 ADMUX = ADMUX | (channel & 0x1F); /* set channel, upper 3 bits masked */
00075 }
00076 
00077 /** start an ADConversion, busy-wait for the result and return it
00078  *  a conversion will last approx. 12us (calculated, not measured, TODO)
00079  * @return the conversion result
00080  */
00081 unsigned int read_adc()
00082 {
00083                 /* set "start conversion" bit in adc control register */
00084                 ADCSRA = ADCSRA | (1<<ADSC);
00085                 /* busy-wait for sampling-result */
00086                 while( !(ADCSRA & (1<<ADIF)) )
00087                         /* nop */;
00088                 return ADC;
00089 }
00090 
00091 /** demo-code: read in all ADC channels and print their
00092  * result to the first uart.
00093  */
00094 void print_all_adc( void )
00095 {
00096         char buf[20];
00097         int i,o;
00098         for(o=0; o<8; o++)
00099         {
00100                 adc_sel_channel(o); /* select channel */
00101                 i = read_adc(); /* read channel */
00102                 snprintf(buf, 20, "ADC %d: %d/1024 \r\n", o, i);
00103                 uart_puts(buf); 
00104         }
00105 }
